attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no evidence that ID cards actually reduce fraud or 'Illegal immigration'. France has had such a system in place since 1940 and has seen no significant drop in either, or other illigal activities the government will have us believe they will curb.
 This is mearly a means of making everyone's personal data more accessible to those that need it. Namely retailers and the banking industry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
